vrack_introduction_description:
Manage the private connection of all your infrastructure components, all over the globe.
vRack technology (virtual bay) enables you to connect, isolate or distribute your services within one or multiple private and secure networks.
vrack_introduction_change_owner: You can also change owner if you need to.
vrack_guide_link_text: For more information, see our guide.
vrack_error: Oops, we were unable to retrieve your vRack data.
vrack_add_error: Oops, there was an error while adding a service to your vRack.
vrack_remove_error: Oops, there was an error while deleting a service from your vRack.
vrack_help: Select one or more services to add to or delete from your vRack:
vrack_cloud_warning: Warning, it is still not possible to get cloud products to communicate with other types of products. However this will be enabled over the next few months. For the moment communication is only possible inside the same project.
vrack_cloud_name_pattern: The name must start with a letter and cannot have any spaces.
vrack_cloud_no_description: Add a description for this vRack
vrack_cloud_no_description_title: Click to add a description for this vRack
vrack_cloud_reset_description: Discard changes made to the description
vrack_cloud_reset_name: Discard changes made to the name
vrack_cloud_save_description: Save changes made to the description
vrack_move_dialog_intro: You selected a Private Cloud datacentre. This service cannot stand on its own and must be moved to another vRack.
vrack_move_dialog_warning_notice: This operation will cause 5 minutes service disruption.
vrack_move_dialog_request_error: Oops... the datacentre migration has failed.
